text:
Akira | Android Engineer | Toronto, Canada | Full Time | http://akira.md

Akira is a doctor in your pocket. We're on a mission to automate medicine.

We're hiring an Android Engineer to lead development of Akira for Android devices. We're big on mobile-first, and we're also big on equality of experience between Android and iOS.

We're also launching first in Canada, so if you're Canadian this is a chance to make a difference at home!

Shoot me a line at dustin+hn@akira.md
